games.title: Eclipse: Shadows of the Cosmos
games.description: Embark on an interstellar adventure in this open-world RPG where you explore distant galaxies, build alliances, and uncover the mysteries of a dying universe.

games.title: Neon Legends: Cyber Rebellion
games.description: A fast-paced action game set in a dystopian cyberpunk world. Hack, slash, and fight your way through neon-lit streets to overthrow a corrupt regime.

games.title: Fantasy Realms: Dawn of the Ancients
games.description: A fantasy MMORPG where players can create their own heroes, explore vast magical lands, and battle legendary creatures in epic quests.

games.title: Racing Horizon: Ultimate Drift
games.description: The ultimate racing experience with hyper-realistic graphics, customizable cars, and intense drift competitions across global tracks.

games.title: Zombie Outbreak: Survival Chronicles
games.description: A survival horror game where you must scavenge for resources, build shelters, and fend off hordes of zombies in a post-apocalyptic world.
